title: As the Brexit fog recedes, money is set to flow into sterling-denominated assets
text:
Writing ahead of Saturday’s Westminster showdown, I can only hope you’re reading this after Boris Johnson’s deal has cleared the House of Commons. If recalcitrant MPs have indeed finally agreed to implement the June 2016 referendum result, let’s see how it fares in that ermine-clad chamber of Remain which is the House of Lords.

Since the last Economic Agenda, as the prospects of securing a new UK/EU withdrawal agreement got better and were then realised, sterling gained a whopping 6pc against the dollar and 5pc against the euro.

Over the last week, having fallen on the fabled “any deal is impossible” phone call between Johnson and Angela Merkel, the pound chalked up its strongest performance...
description: Writing ahead of Saturday’s Westminster showdown, I can only hope you’re reading this after Boris Johnson’s deal has cleared the House of Commons.
